title: Eduardo Recife
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809021313/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809021313/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Eduardo Recife**

[Brazilian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809021313/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Brazil) graphic designer and typeface designer, creator of [Misprinted Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809021313/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Misprinted%20Type).
author: Miguel Sousa
